mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookreport(bookreport_no, user_email, product_no, write_date, bookreport_title, bookreport_content, view_count, report_kind, star) VALUES(bookreport_seq.nextval, #{user_email}, #{product_no}, sysdate, #{bookreport_title}, #{bookreport_content}, 0, #{report_kind}, #{star})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.user_name, c.jjoa_no FROM bookreport a INNER JOIN customer_info b ON a.user_email = b.user_email LEFT OUTER JOIN jjoa c ON a.bookreport_no = c.bookreport_no and a.user_email = c.user_email WHERE a.bookreport_no = #{bookreport_no}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bookreport WHERE user_email = #{user_email} and bookreport_no = #{bookreport_no}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM bookreport a INNER JOIN customer_info b ON a.user_email = b.user_email WHERE ${search_select} like '%'||'${search_text}'||'%')
WHERE write_date BETWEEN ${date_select} and sysdate ORDER BY bookreport_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_article(rep_article_no, rep_article_info, rep_article_date, article_no, rep_article_email) VALUES(report_article_seq.nextval, #{rep_article_info}, sysdate, #{article_no}, #{rep_article_email})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM report_article WHERE article_no = #{article_no} and rep_article_email = #{rep_article_email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jjoa(jjoa_no, bookreport_no, user_email) VALUES(jjoa_seq.nextval, #{bookreport_no}, #{user_email})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM jjoa WHERE bookreport_no = #{bookreport_no} and user_email = #{user_email}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM jjoa WHERE bookreport_no = #{bookreport_no} and user_email = #{user_email}
SELECT count(*) jjoa_count FROM jjoa WHERE bookreport_no = #{bookreport_no}

SELECT a.*, b.user_name, nvl(c.jjoa_count,0) jjoa_count FROM bookreport a INNER JOIN customer_info b ON a.user_email = b.user_email LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT count(*) jjoa_count, bookreport_no FROM jjoa group by bookreport_no) c ON a.bookreport_no = c.bookreport_no ORDER BY jjoa_count desc
